Main Article Title

By Test Author | January 1, 2024

This is the main content of the article. It contains the primary information that should be extracted by the content extraction system. The extraction should ignore the navigation, sidebar, and footer noise.

The second paragraph continues with more substantive content about the research topic. This paragraph provides additional context and supporting details that are relevant to the query.

Advertisement: Buy our product!

After the advertisement, the article continues with more information. Good extraction algorithms should be able to identify and extract this content while filtering out the advertisement block.
